title: Manmohan Singh Education: Former PM Schooling, Colleges, Degrees and Academic Achievements
snippet: Manmohan Singh from the information provided below: Dr. Manmohan Singh began his educational journey in Gah, a small village in Punjab (now in Pakistan). He attended the local primary school in his village.

title: 'A single meeting with staff of Dr Manmohan Singh ushered an era of development in our village' | Amritsar News - Times of India
snippet: He said that the villagers had hoped that if a single meeting could usher in an era of development for their community and if Dr. Manmohan Singh himself visited his birthplace, it might have had a significant impact.
